General.Name: Pelangi Indah Canindo Tbk
General.Description: PT Pelangi Indah Canindo Tbk manufactures and sells metal containers in Indonesia. It offers steel drums, LPG cylinder tanks, pail cans, food cans, and general cans, as well as can packaging services; and metal printing services. PT Pelangi Indah Canindo Tbk was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Daan Mogot Km 14 No.700, Jakarta, Indonesia, 11840
